core.name: module1_packet_detect
core.desc: Single MAIN_LOOP: write-through all N+2 iterations, incremental sliding window, deferred metric pipeline, conditional detection (II=1)

mem-data_buf.name: data_buf
mem-data_buf.desc: Circular BRAM [32], D-sample delay, FP-MEMSEL cat 3 (no PARTITION)

out-data_out.name: data_out
out-data_out.desc: Output: complex_t, ALL 26105 samples (write-through to duplicator)

out-startOffset_out.name: startOffset_out
out-startOffset_out.desc: Output: index_t, detection position scalar (to duplicator)
